data.actual_result: Volume slider glitches side to side slightly. (vid attached).
data.short_description: User volume adjusts itself randomly, eventually leading to a crash after manually altering it.
data.steps_to_repro: - Be on a server where you have perms to kick/ban - Open someone's profile (that you can kick or ban) and scroll down all the way. - Move user volume slider while sliding up quickly (vid attached)
